website_summaries.verdict: Quality memory foam pillow with soft yet supportive structure. Can be used for various purposes and provides comfortable support when sleeping or relaxing in different positions.
pros: Versatile half-moon shape makes this pillow practical for many uses, including to provide neck support
Curved design fits the contours of the head and heck nicely
Cover is removable and easy to clean
cons: Pillow has a strong chemical odor that may or may not fade with use

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect size to keep between my legs and even rest ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews but this pillow exceeds my expectations. I've tried many pillows in the past for between my legs as a side sleeper and none have worked - too heavy, cumbersome, big (full body pillows) and smaller. This! This is the perfect size to keep between my legs and even rest my arm. It's firm and doesn't crush down with use but not rock hard. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is crap, pillow is good
customer_reviews.text: The pillow itself is great, I love the adjustability. I need the extra pad in there when using it in between my knees while sleeping but prefer it without the pad when I am using it under my knees while sitying up. It would have gotten 5 stars except for the cover. The zipper they used on it was extremely shoddy since I went to try and add the pad in and the zipper is now nonfunctional. Only the 3rd time it has been unzipped!
customer_reviews.author: de

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow and actually bought 3
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow and actually bought 3. Gave 2 to my family members and they loved it also. The only reason I'm deducting one star is because of the material of the pillow case . It gets lint balls really quickly that are hard to get off but other than that it's great!
customer_reviews.author: TRUE CHAKRA TAROT TALK

customer_reviews.title: Great support pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I had disc surgery about 1 year ago and this pillow is perfect to relieve the pressure on my lower back when sleeping on my back. Its also super comfortable for side sleeping. Unfortunately my dog loved it as a chew toy one day and destroyed it. I am ordering another one!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow and would recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Have used this behind my back sitting on the couch. Under my knees and under my ankles while lying down. Love this pillow and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: beverly craig

customer_reviews.title: Good but not high enough.
customer_reviews.text: It’s really soft memory foam, overall the quality is good and smell is minimal. It doesn’t have enough height to use in a satisfactory manner under my knees when laying in my back. It’s also very soft so what height it does offer compressed pretty quickly. That said, I will keep it and repurpose it to give pillows a little elevation when I travel instead of bringing a pillow wedge. My cat has also taking a liking to it — she likes to lay on it and “knead” her paws. In any case it’s not a bad purchase, just not significantly high enough or firm enough to use to elevate knees when laying on your back.
customer_reviews.author: Nick S.

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Top-Notch
customer_reviews.text: My cushion's cover came with a slight rip/tear and the vendor sent me a replacement cover with no hassle. Excellent response !! As for the product itself, it's a bit longer than I'd like (I use it as a knee cushion) but the height and support is good - the insert is really helpful - and the cushion seems of good quality. The cover is especially nice. All-in-all, I'm a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: BBL in Scottsdale

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for a couple nights now for my lower back and it has been great, very firm but not in a brick-firm kind of way. Was fine just the way it shipped. Will edit if I encounter any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Zipper and smell..
customer_reviews.text: In terms of comfort this pillow is alright, gets the job done. However, I can't stand to put it anywhere near my nose because the smell is putrid. Washed the covers and it ended up smelling bad right after I put the pads in. The zipper and cover is made of shoddy materials...Zipper failed to work after inserting the pads after the wash. So now my cover is only halfway zipped up. Doesn't help the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Hoang Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for the perfect pillow for me and I think I found it. I normally use the tempur pedic contour pillow which I still love also but this pillow allows me to switch up if I need to. It does sit a little high which I don’t mind and it hugs the back of my neck giving me support as I sleep. Update: I usually see a Chiro every other week and since using this pillow I’ve had less visits. The pillow has worn slightly but its contoured more to my neck. I do travel with it as well and it does fit into my luggage. I still love this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Multi-purpose and exceptional customer service
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly and as described. There was a small tear in the cover, but when I contacted their customer service, they were quick in resolving the situation and very friendly. I had ankle surgery including an incision in my heel so this works well on keeping my heel elevated. I also found it works great as a reading pillow. I would absolutely recommend this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: I love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow. It came a bit smaller than I imagined length wise, but still works well. I use this to help me sleep on my back under my knees for back support. It is very comfortable and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lexus

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow, one small pet peeve
customer_reviews.text: I love this as I've fought with pillows to provide enough support under my knees and/or between my legs [I'm a back and side sleeper]. Now, I don't have to worry about that. My pet peeve is that the additional piece of foam doesn't stay in place and is hard to adjust back into place. The 2 pieces of foam don't want to smoothly move against each other.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works well, wish it had cooling gel
customer_reviews.text: This works well for lower back support when sitting up. I use it with a wedge to sleep upright. The bolster is wide enough for effective support while you sleep. The only Improvement I'd make is to add a layer of cooling gel. It stays put while sitting or sleeping but sometimes moves around when you are getting settled in. I'm thinking about using velcro to attach it to the wedge but it's really not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great Support Pillow Sets
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the pillow support sets. They look and work exactly as advertised. I got them to relieve the symptoms of acid reflux. My wife got them to relieve lower back pain. We are both sleeping more soundly and longer. Sleeping with the shoulders and neck raised has taken some getting used to, but the transition from sleeping flat on the mattress has not been insurmountable. MY WIFE AND I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Bendrick

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for back sleepers
customer_reviews.text: Great under knee support for back sleep and hip support for side sleep. I have to admit I'm doing a lot less tossing and turning since I've started using this. If you over extend your knees while you sleep, its a must! There's no better self care than a good night's sleep - do yourself a solid and get one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G

customer_reviews.title: Very firm
customer_reviews.text: In my experience, this pillow was strongly firm and was too uncomfortable on my neck that I woke up the next day with a sore neck. I may have to look for a softer pillow since I am a back sleeper. But maybe a firm pillow like this one will work on some people. It is simply a matter of preference.
customer_reviews.author: Smf3

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is so comfortable. Bought it to support my knees while sleeping and it does the trick. It helps relieve the knee pain so that I can sleep. No matter which way I sleep, it provides space so my knees are not together and the pain is gone. Bought one for my husband, too, and he loves his support pillow, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great! I like the fact you can make the pillow to two different heights, pillow case easliy washable too. Good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette A.

customer_reviews.title: Supportive and firm, but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly as a knee boslter. I wouldn't want it any smaller so I don't see myself taking out that extra padding, as that would make it pretty small. Foam is nice and didn't need to air out much at all upon opening. I wish they offered a pillowcase as an add-on item- the cover is nice, but it looks "bare" and I'd prefer to frequently wash an outer pillowcase to save on wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: No extra covers
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this pillow and it works well for my old neck. I just wish these bolster pillows came with extra covers. Bolster pillow covers are impossible to find and it seems like if you're going to make the pillow and sell it with a case, you ought to at least offer the cases for sale too.
customer_reviews.author: Zeldilla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pillow to keep knees bent while sleeping. I have been just using a regular pillow, but this is 100 times better. The cover is soft and removable for cleaning. It is dense form and very sturdy. It definitely helps my back.
customer_reviews.author: C Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great for neck/shoulder issues. Wish it had two adjustable inserts.
customer_reviews.text: I've been battling a stiff neck/strained tendon due to many years of computer work and I always wake up stiff and miserable so I got this pillow after reading Amazon reviews. I use it every night now and it works pretty well for me and I don't wake up anymore with a stiff neck. I only wish it came with two adjustable foam inserts (it has one) for people like me with a slight curve in the neck. Halfway through the night, I have to switch to a regular pillow because the height is a bit too much for a full night's sleep. But overall, it works pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Hema Padhu

customer_reviews.title: Very, very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Having to put off knee surgery because of COVID 19, I was desperate for something to help me sleep without pain. In a week this pillow has reduced swelling significantly and relieved my pain to a manageable level. It keeps the knees at just the right level and allows me to actually sleep 6-7 hours straight. It’s soft and comfy and even works well laying on my side. While not everyone may not get the relief I have, for $25 it’s worth a try. I highly recommend it and I, admittedly, was very skeptical.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Owings

customer_reviews.title: Coop Half- Moon Bolster
customer_reviews.text: I planned to use this pillow between my knees when sleeping on my side, and under my knees when sleeping on my back. It is great when sleeping on my back, but no so much when on my side. I will use it when I need lumbar support in a chair , or under my knees when watching TV or reading in bed, but not for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice height and width. It is just to soft it just collapses under weight.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bohannan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent after...
customer_reviews.text: Setting the 2 cushions and cover in the sun for 3 full days and then washing and drying the cover as well. The smell was extremely strong when delivered. However, once the smell was eliminated the product functions quite well. I only use it with my recliner.
customer_reviews.author: Retired

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable Support Pillow.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I put it under the back of my legs and/or the small of my back and find it to be very supportive. I tend to get leg cramps in the back of my legs from working all day and night and this helps relieve some of the tension I have in my hamstrings.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillow. Well made
customer_reviews.text: Nice pillow. Well made .....However was not expecting it to be this big and too firm. I needed it to fill the space behing my lower back while sitting on my recliner watching tv.
customer_reviews.author: Rache

customer_reviews.title: Everything I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This product is superb! i was looking for some back relief and something that would keep me from slipping down while I am reading. this gave me both. Came back the next day and bought one for my husband. I especially appreiciate the height adjustments which gave me the ability to tweek it to just the right height for me!
customer_reviews.author: Alma Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Assist for Side & Back Sleeping
customer_reviews.text: My Mom has very tight hips & back and this pillow is perfect for her to place between her knees while sleeping on her side, or underneath her knees with sleeping on her back. It's the perfect size and is helping alleviate her discomfort! No odor! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: WASK

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Has removable 1" support. Nice washable cover. Firm support Another awesome COOP product.
customer_reviews.author: Liam's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of back pain so I use a pillow under my legs. It wasn’t working as well so I decided to try a bolster and I’m so glad I did! It’s helped so much! I like that I can take the foam in and out and the cover is nice and soft. It didn’t take long for the foam smell to go away after I opened it. My dog even likes putting her head on it!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not good looking term.
customer_reviews.text: Ive had it for 3 months and the pillow has died. It doesn't stay firm anymore. 😭 It was great at first though.
customer_reviews.author: A. January

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is amazing! I use it behind my knees when sleeping on my back. I use it when sitting to support lower back. It provides relief from a sway back and promotes heeling from knee and hip replacement surgeries! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Prairie Mama

customer_reviews.title: Pillow Comfort and Support Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: This may sound like hyperbole, but I LOVE this support pillow! This is truly a rave review - the pillow exceeded my expectations. I am going to be ordering two more for my son, and my car. I had extensive back surgery and need extra support. This does it. Pain relief is hard to judge because I'd like a new back (!), but while I'm sitting, I'm comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Susan in Delmar, NY

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's suppose to, works great, noticed no odors or smell, just the right size to elevate the legs while sleeping, hubby says so.
customer_reviews.author: DIANE

customer_reviews.title: Like it but smells
customer_reviews.text: I really like the pillow, but it smells so bad (at least mine did). Update: The pillow flattened after a few months, not as comfortable anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth P.

customer_reviews.title: I use it as a fluffy foot rest
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this "Coop Home Goods - 4 Position Half-Moon Bolster/Wedge Pillow with Adjustable Inserts" to put under the curve of my back when I sleep but it's too tall. I use it under my feet as a foot rest under my home desk. It feels good to my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is large enough for a large person, very firm. great for my back. Finally got a full night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: jojop

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and no off gas smell!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since a bad fall onto my knees that acted like a car accident I have had discomfort sleeping flat on my back. This pillow does the trick! It is great not to wake with pain in my knees!
customer_reviews.author: Thea & Eric

customer_reviews.title: horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: This pillow smells like mold. The manufacture told me to air it outside and the smell would dissipate. They were wrong. I left it outside allday, but it still smelled like mold. Also, thezipper is very hard to close. It was however nice and firm but, I just could not stand to get past that awful smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Hecht

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really helpful with the neck pain that I was having
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bolster, just wish it could be slightly taller for under the knees. I like the bamboo cover, its comfortable. Has been holding shape well.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pillows I have found for my neck pain and acid reflux. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: netta2121

customer_reviews.title: it helps  tremendously
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and convience use it every night to help[ me thru bilateral hip replacements
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Hornig

customer_reviews.title: works very well.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third bolster. It allows me to sleep more upright and breathe more easily. Three bolsters help me get more comfortable on three king size pillows across the queen size bed. Asthma feels much better.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte R Weinberger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is what I was looking for. When I got a massage the therapist placed a pillow like this under my knees. I could immediately feel the pressure off my back. So I started looking for a similar pillow. This is it! I really feel comfortable with it and I don't wake up with back pain. Yet, it is not too large to get in the way at night. Now I don't wake up with back pain. It is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow! I put it under my knees when I first get in bed to help my lower back and then in the night I use it between my knees to help my hips stay aligned. Less pain during the day and night now!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy K

customer_reviews.title: Best Wedge Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my shorter half moon / wedge pillow. I am very pleased on the length. I did have to remove the extra insert as I felt it was just a tad to high for my comfort. I lay on my side with my top leg bent, resting on this pillow. I actually use it what I call upside down. I have the flat part on top and the rounded part into the mattress. This works best for me. If I ever need to replace, I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Loyas

customer_reviews.title: Too firm.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this as a replacement to my well loved pillow. It is too firm, hurts my neck, gives me a morning headache. Wish I returned in the return window
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: A great pillow and it looks nice too - (as in not really therapeutic looking)!
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel and elevation level. I actually bought two different types and returned the other one, as it was much too big and bulky. This one is just perfect for tired, achy feet and legs that need elevating.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sitting All Dayt
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and adjustable makes this a winner. I removed one piece of flat foam to make it a better fit for me. Cover is washable so that really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Clair Darden

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful with lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: This product works great for my lower back problems! I’ve been waking up with less pain in the morning. Just have to get used to sleeping on my back and It makes me a little hot! And I use it to when I turn I use it in between my legs! Overall it’s a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this pillow. It raises my knees to alleviate the pressure on my lower back, and I'm sleeping very well! Thinking about getting a second one to keep in my travel bag
customer_reviews.author: kristi

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for both knees and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just received this pillow for my bad knee and the size and cushion amount is exactly what I needed to get relief from my pain.
customer_reviews.author: pamala

customer_reviews.title: Good elevation
customer_reviews.text: After soaking my swollen feet and putting rub on them, the bolster keeps them elevated until dried and swelling goes down. I place a towel around it to eliminate staining by the rub.
customer_reviews.author: marie mcbride

customer_reviews.title: Great for back and side sleepers! And has a removable pillow to adjust heights.
customer_reviews.text: As a side sleeper, I use this pillow at my waist in conjunction with a knee pillow to maintain my spinal alignment overnight. I find that the overnight soreness that I'm used to waking up with from spinal stenosis is greatly reduced. The removable insert is an added bonus, essentially allowing you to adjust the height of the arc.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Keener

customer_reviews.title: best for back sleepers
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pillow a few months and it has held up great. I am a side sleeper so it goes between my knees and it is not the most comfortable due to the shape but when I do lay on my back it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lightning

customer_reviews.title: My Mistake!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I did enough research to get a 'taller pillow. The item is good and I am using it, but, through my fault, it does not meet my original needs.
customer_reviews.author: Tony E

customer_reviews.title: Great for side sleepers
customer_reviews.text: It you’re side sleeper and have neck and arms problem, get this in firm size. Love it. My pains are gone and now I sleeps well. I bought two.
customer_reviews.author: MC Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Not too high, not too soft, not too hard - just exactly right. I use it crosswise for lumbar and vertically along my spine as well.
customer_reviews.author: sas

customer_reviews.title: Depends on what you want to use it for.
customer_reviews.text: It would be better if memory foam. Foam used is stiffer than I wanted. Does well between legs but hurts my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Geez_yoy

customer_reviews.title: Look no further! Fantastic Product!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a memory foam half bolster, this is it! I have been using it for several months and it's still as nice as it was the day I received it.
customer_reviews.author: AJMcD

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable pillow
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly comfortable pillow. Solved my neck problems for a side sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Gary G.

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was more adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: I can support myself while i sleep but i use this to add a little more support when i lay on my side. The pillow goes behind my back to support my spine. I wish there was a pad that was maybe half the size of what it came with. The pillow seems to be to big or to small at times.
customer_reviews.author: Ever

customer_reviews.title: This is a great support pillow.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to deal with lower back pain. This pillow gives great support. It is firm & holds up well to leaning back against it. I recommend this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Gene King

customer_reviews.title: Great for elevating legs
customer_reviews.text: OMG, love this! Sent in a vacuum sealed bag, it's ready within minutes, if you're impatient. Perfect support for under my knees under my weighted blanket. I wouldn't use it as a head pillow, however. Little to high for that.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy R

customer_reviews.title: Stable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. The half cylinder shape makes it very stable also. It doesn't roll from under your knees (I use it under my knees when I lay in bed and read)
customer_reviews.author: dark light

customer_reviews.title: It's a squishy pillow
customer_reviews.text: It's not very firm unless it's cold. It's squishy, so my husband disagrees with it being supportive. I do not recommend this product for anyone with back problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: On my back: Keeps my knees from being too elevated On my side: Keeps my hips relaxed, and not tight if this is between my knees. I have to drag this one when I'm travelling for anything. <3
customer_reviews.author: Mehcat

customer_reviews.title: Leg support
customer_reviews.text: This item is being used as part of therapy exercises after my knee replacement. Perfect size & shape.
customer_reviews.author: wittygal

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product. Too big for a neck support
customer_reviews.text: The quality I expect from coop. I got this half bolster to support my neck since I now have to sleep sitting up right. It's much too big for my neck but it works nicely as a lumbar support on my wedge.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow works great for me as a "side sleeper" and while stretching out to lay flat on my back. Very good value as well, for what was paid.
customer_reviews.author: William McBride

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very handy! I use this to support my injured shoulder at night. It's the perfect size after I removed the extra pad. It's soft, but maintains its structure well. Works great as neck support while reading, or as knee support when laying on my side. The cover is soft, but I'll probably sew a case to protect it further. (And to better match my bed) Upon opening, I did leave it near my fireplace (not too close) for a couple of hours so it would inflate. The new pillow smell went away after a day or two. All in all, I absolutely love it! I'll be buying another for my boyfriend.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Wagner

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this pillow - I can sleep on my side again!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for SI joint pain, and it definitely helps, but I also love that I can sleep on my side again now. So, so comfortable i never leave without it if going away got a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Coop products! This is my second purchase with Coop because they are such quality pillows!,
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: The covers are washable and the inserts easy to remove
customer_reviews.text: I have lower back problems and these cushions provided the right amount of extra support I needed. They are well made. The covers are washable and the inserts easy to remove. I will definitely purchase more of their products.
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Useful pillow pad
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid firm pad that can be used in a veraity of ways and you can take one of the layers inside out for a smaller less firm feel.
customer_reviews.author: Cochise

customer_reviews.title: Comfort...
customer_reviews.text: Works as stated. Puffs up after you let it oxygenate.
customer_reviews.author: Lili J. Mcgovern

customer_reviews.title: No more messy "bed hair" in the morning !
customer_reviews.text: The half-tound pillow was softer when I removed the foam insert, just right for me. It is easy on my spine and doesn't mess up my hair the way traditional pillows do. It fits the curvature of my neck and upper spine perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: wonderful pillow!! I use mine for my knees. I'm very pleased and would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: B. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great for under the legs, but not great for lower back
customer_reviews.text: Well-made. Quality materials and support. Should come with a cover or sleeve for the price.
customer_reviews.author: GAC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pillow for sore hip joints
customer_reviews.text: Another great pillow from COOP! Much better than any other pillow I’ve owned for hip pain. Thanks guys!
customer_reviews.author: KMH

customer_reviews.title: Solid support
customer_reviews.text: Solid support for under the knees and have used it also for a wedge behind the neck to support while reading.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Pidhayny

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Works well for my neck. I am a big guy though, built like a linebacker, so those with smaller frames may find it to big.
customer_reviews.author: PBFF

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it is...
customer_reviews.text: The memory foam is nice and responsive. It is a very comfortable pillow. I was hoping that it would be taller. It does not lift my knees enough to relieve the stress on my back.
customer_reviews.author: Parallel Fifth

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. The reason for only 4 stars is that it won’t work for a pillow for me
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for all of your caring and advice on how to make adjustments on the pillow for a good nights rest. The pillow is a wonderful help in relieving my neck pain. Only wish I knew about it before spending so much money on other pillows. I am thinking about ordering another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Windsong73

customer_reviews.title: Receive a pillow with a hole on top
customer_reviews.text: Received a broken one. There is a hole on the pillow!!! Bad quality!
customer_reviews.author: Sheng Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Did Absolutely Nothing !
customer_reviews.text: Did not help my back pain at all in fact made it worst when I slept. I tried sleeping with it under my knees it didn’t work I tried sleeping with it under my back it didn’t work, I guess this is for people that just toss & turn in their sleep not for actually helping back pain.

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping is a breeze with these support pillows!
customer_reviews.text: These support pilloew are absolutely wonderful for back pain, Leg & hip pain and also neck pain! I just received my third support pillow -this one is for my neck pain!

product_meta.title: Coop Home Goods - 4 Position Half-Moon Bolster/Wedge Pillow with Adjustable Inserts - Memory Foam Support - Removable Lulltra Cover Bamboo Derived Rayon - Helps Relieve Back, Neck, Knee & Ankle Pain
feature_bullets: CAN’T GET COMFORTABLE? WE’VE GOT YOU COVERED! - Short or tall, man or woman, pregnant or not, our pillow has been uniquely designed and contoured to be adjustable to meet your own special needs! This pillow includes a removable foam insert for adjustability. You can easily control the height of the pillow for just the right fit. Those other generic bolster pillows can't even compare. Your comfort is in your hands. REST EASY!

MANY FUNCTIONS – ONE PILLOW! - This memory foam pillow provides comfortable support and aids alignment for side or back sleepers, those who experience sciatic pain, pregnant women, and many more. You can use the Coop Home Goods 4 Position Pillow behind your back, between and under your knees or below your ankles. Also, you can use it during a massage or while doing yoga. IT IS ORTHOPEDICALLY DESIGNED TO BE MULTIFUNCTIONAL AND TO RELIEVE PAIN!

SAFE AND HYPPOALLERGENIC, AND THAT`S A FACT! - Our Coop Home Goods 4 Position Pillows are CertiPUR-US Certified. This means they are hypoallergenic and do not contain PVC or Vinyl. No toxic or harmful chemicals here! It`s 100% safe for you and your loved ones. ALLERGY SUFFERERS NO LONGER NEED TO COMPROMISE COMFORT!

ONLY THE HIGHEST QUALITY MATERIALS - Our Lulltra fabric has naturally thermoregulating properties to ensure a comfortable, continuous sleep. Our Bolster Pillow comes with a removable and washable cover made from our Bamboo Derived Viscose and Polyester blend. This cover has cooling properties that can reduce the heat while you sleep, unlike velvet or velour covers that don't cool at all.

LOVE IT OR RETURN IT! - You can now purchase with confidence. If you don’t fall in love within 100 days (although we’re sure you will), contact us directly to return the pillow for a full refund. NO QUESTIONS ASKED. Coop Home Goods Bolster Pillow also comes with a 5-year warranty.
